description: This file defines a React component 'LoginPage' responsible for user login UI and logic within a web application. It handles user authentication, navigation upon successful login, and displays login form elements.

methods.name: LoginPage()
methods.description: React functional component that renders a login form, manages local state, handles login logic, and performs navigation on success.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission: performs login asynchronously, shows success or error toasts, and navigates on success.
